QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Saline nasal washes
QAPair.Answer: A saline nasal wash helps flush pollen, dust, and other debris from your nasal passages. It also helps remove excess mucus (snot) and adds moisture. Your nasal passages are open spaces behind your nose. Air passes through your nasal passages before entering your lungs. Nasal washes can help relieve nasal allergy symptoms and help prevent sinus infections ( sinusitis ).
